synthesis_conditions.cooling_rate: slowly cooled to room temperature over 168 h
synthesis_conditions.equipment: 50 ml PTFE bottle in an autoclave

single_crystal_X-ray_structure_analysis.equipment: Rigaku AFC7R diffractometer with graphite-monochromated Mo-Kα radiation (λ = 0.71069 Å) and a CCD detector
single_crystal_X-ray_structure_analysis.method: direct method (SIR2004) and refined on F2 using full-matrix least-squares methods with SHELXL-97
single_crystal_X-ray_structure_analysis.details: All non-hydrogen atoms were refined with anisotropic thermal factors. One oxygen site was refined as 50% occupancy.

IR_spectroscopy.equipment: Thermo Nicolet NEXUS 670 FT–IR spectrometer with compacted KBr pellets

ac_impedance_measurements.method: compacted pellet of a powder sample with two gold electrodes attached to both ends with four end terminals (quasi-four-probe method)
